Entrees.name: New York Strip
Entrees.description: 16 oz. Strip topped with garlic shallot butter. Served with roasted potatoes and brussel sprouts. (add crab cake for upcharge)

Entrees.name: Mahi Mahi
Entrees.description: Brown butter mahi mahi served with creamy parmesan risotto and asparagus.

Entrees.name: Ale Battered Fish and Chips
Entrees.description: Cod battered to order, topped with pickled onions.  Served with old bay fries and housemade dill tartar.

Entrees.name: 1/2 Chicken
Entrees.description: Topped with hat honey and slow cooked roasted potatoes and brussel sprouts.

Entrees.name: Mushroom Risotto
Entrees.description: Creamy risotta with Cremini and Oyster mushrooms. (add chicken or shrimp for upcharge)

Entrees.name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Mac
Entrees.description: Grilled chicken and bacon topped with ranch over house mac and cheese.

Entrees.name: Cajun Chicken Tortellini
Entrees.description: Grilled Cajun chicken and diced tomatoes in a creamy alfredo with tri-colored tortellini.

Entrees.name: Tuna Tare Tare
Entrees.description: Sushi grade tuna, avocado, cucumber, sesame seeds, scallions, and wonton chips.

Entrees.name: Sauteed Sirloin Tips
Entrees.description: Seasoned sirloin with onions and mixed mushrooms over roasted potatoes, covered in smoky Gouda cheese sauce.

Sandwiches.name: Skook Steak
Sandwiches.description: Chipped kielbasa, grilled onion and beer cheese on a fresh steak roll

Sandwiches.name: Bison Burger
Sandwiches.description: 8 oz. bison burger with pepper jack cheese, pickled red onion, Boston lettuce, and plum tomato and fresh cut fries.

Sandwiches.name: BBQ Chicken Quesadilla
Sandwiches.description: Grilled chicken, caramelized, roasted tomatoes, cheddar jack cheese, BBQ.

Sandwiches.name: Tavern Panini
Sandwiches.description: Marinated grilled chicken with roasted tomatoes, baby arugula, semi-sharp provolone, garlic aioli and fresh cut fries.

Sandwiches.name: Shrimp Po Boy
Sandwiches.description: Beer battered shrimp, lettuce, tomato, zingy remoulade on a fresh Corropolese roll.

Appetizers.name: Barrel Fries
Appetizers.description: Hand cut fries. Topped with braised beef, grilled onions, mild provolone and gravy.

Appetizers.name: Homestyle Peirogies
Appetizers.description: Pierogies and onions sauteed in butter, topped with cheddar cheese and served sour cream.

Appetizers.name: Bavarian Pretzels
Appetizers.description: Served with honey Dijon mustard and beer cheese.

Appetizers.name: Cheesesteak Eggrolls
Appetizers.description: Deep Fried cheesesteak eggrolls topped with whole grain aioli and a side of spicy ketchup.

Appetizers.name: Smoked or Boneless Wings
Appetizers.description: Choice of smoked wings or boneless wings, served with choice of sauce.

Appetizers.name: Crab Dip
Appetizers.description: Home made crab dip served in bread bowl.

Appetizers.name: Crab Rangoon Flatbread
Appetizers.description: Lump crab meat, cream cheese, fried wontons, sweet and sour sauce topped with scallions.

Appetizers.name: California Mac and Cheese Flatbread
Appetizers.description: Spicy Mac and Cheese with grilled chicken and bacon.

Sliders.name: Crab Cake Sliders
Sliders.description: Mini crab cakes with bib lettuce, plum tomato, garlic aioli.

Sliders.name: Buffalo Chicken Sliders
Sliders.description: Fried chicken fingers tossed in house sauce with crumbled blue cheese, ranch, lettuce and tomato.

Sliders.name: Braised Beef Sliders
Sliders.description: Braised beef topped with beer cheese and carmelized onions.

Sliders.name: Super Flight
Sliders.description: One of each of our sliders

Salads.name: Caesar Salad
Salads.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing.

Salads.name: Berry Salad
Salads.description: Strawberries, blueberries, mixed harvest greens, red onion, almonds, goat cheese, grilled chicken and a raspberry balsamic vinaigrette.

Salads.name: California Salad
Salads.description: Mixed greens, grilled chicken, bacon, cheddar jack cheese, diced tomato and onion with an avocado ranch dressing.
